Home.limeBoostTemplate: For a limited time, you can earn <multiplier>times</multiplier> more JUZ in the Trivia game and by inviting friends!

dailyRefill.title: Daily hearts refill
dailyRefill.content: Get a full-hearts refill every 24 hours. Make it to the top and earn rewards for being the smartest player in the World!

howToPlay.title: How to play?
howToPlay.content: Spin the wheel. Get daily random topics, play a trivia mini-game and earn JUZ!

success.juzBought: Long live the Master of JUZ

templates.confirmBuyJUZ: Confirm to buy {amount} JUZ in JUZ Mini App
templates.heartPointsExplainer: Buy a pack of {amount} hearts. Hearts will be added to your current heart points.
templates.buyHearts: Confirm to buy a Pack of {amount} hearts in JUZ Mini App

JUZDistributionModal.title: JUZ Breakdown
JUZDistributionModal.claimAvailable: You have JUZ Tokens available to claim

errors.waitabit: Wait a bit before claiming again

explainers.points: Trivia earned + {isIOS, select, true {other holdings} other {ERC20 Tokens}}

LeaderBoard.whaleMessage: This player has accumulated more tha <amount></amount> of the total supply of JUZ.
LeaderBoard.refreshMessage: Leaderboard can take a while to refresh. Thanks for your patience!

DialogHearts.title: Manage game hearts

explainers.full: Hearts are used to play trivia games. When you miss a question, you lose a heart.
explainers.regular: Hearts are refilled for free every 24 hours. Or get an instant refill with WLD.

DialogHearts.buyRefillMessage: Confirm to refill a total of {hearts} hearts in JUZ Mini App

ModalGame.loadingText: Buckle up! We are cooking the trivia for you...

RewardPools.description: Deposit assets. Earn rewards. Compound and enjoy the JUZ of Yield farming.

contents.0: JUZ Pools are smart vaults with custom strategies that compound rewards and create liquidity positions in incentivized pools to extract the most yield.
contents.1: Anyone can earn a share of the fees by calling the compound function to earn a small portion of the fees.

explainers.apr: APR is calculated based on the current veJUZ supply and the amount of JUZ locked in the pool. APR is variable and can change over time.
explainers.locking: Earn <trigger>veJUZ</trigger> by locking JUZ for a period of time. In the future veJUZ can be used for goverance, access reward pools or airdrops
explainers.drops: Earn unique rewards from other communities by being part of the JUZ ecosystem. More drops coming soon!

contents.0: Vote-Escrowed JUZ (veJUZ) is a protocol token that can be obtained by locking JUZ for period of time. The longer you lock, the greater the earning potential.
contents.1: veJUZ is summed up to your total JUZ balance and can be used to vote in future governance proposals and earn rewards.

InviteSentinel.title: üéÅ Gift available
InviteSentinel.inviteMessage: <inviting></inviting> sent you a gift for joining the trivia mini game JUZ.

DialogInvites.title: Invite your friends
DialogInvites.description: You and your friend get <amount></amount> each when invite is accepted and claimed. And up to <verifiedAmount></verifiedAmount> for verified users!

ModalQuests.title: Daily Quests

tapScreen.tapToContinue: Tap the screen to unlock your reward

freeDaily.explainer: Come back every day to claim your free gift!

triviaWinner1.explainer: Win the trivia game {gamesWon, plural, =0 {at least once} other {one time}} to unlock this quest

error.locked: Play the trivia to unlock this quest

triviaMaster3.explainer: Win the trivia game {gamesWon, plural, =0 {at least 3 times} =1 {2 more times} =2 {one more time} other {3 times}} to unlock this quest

error.locked: Play the trivia to unlock this quest
